thread.title: Merry of Capital Hill
thread.title_full: Homeadvisor reviewed by Merry of Capital Hill

author: Merry of Capital Hill
title: Merry of Capital Hill
text: For ourselves we have hired a handyman service and a general contractor both of which showed up and gave us reasonable bids. The handyman service did a creditable job on our bathroom project. My husband wasn't satisfied with the painting, but the handyman service let him paint over a long weekend before they came back to finish the job. He was very grateful for that. The general contractor still has our project in the works and has submitted plans to the Bldg Dept., so, that opinion is still out. We asked for an electrician for our elderly neighbor and she was very satisfied with his work and would hire him again!
